task-time-calculator.name: Task Time Calculator
task-time-calculator.details: A web app for tracking and managing time spent on tasks. Users can add tasks, run timers, and review accumulated time to optimize productivity. With real-time updates to ensure a error free experience.

form-builder.name: Form Builder
form-builder.details: A web app for creating Salesforce Pardot forms with a click-to-add interface. Users can build, preview, and export structured forms for an easy integration into marketing workflows.

portfolio.name: Portfolio Website
